author: protolambda
content: It looks like one of the attestation tests, "empty_aggregation_bits", in v0.11.1, compared to v0.11.0, was broken. The post-state file is missing, making empty attestations look invalid, while they were previously considered valid (maybe they should not be though?). Has anyone else stumbled on this?

author: protolambda
content: At the same time, it also looks like the attestation signal in that test has gotten zeroed out, instead of being a valid but empty signature. So test can still pass fine as an "invalid case", but not for the reason I intended. Let me know if anyone has experienced any issues. I will look into fixing this for next release

author: protolambda
content: Update: test can pass for now, so you can ignore as implementer. We found the culprit in test generation, and we are looking into related edge cases.
